name: Doodly Do
description:
Enter the world of Doodly do, and put an end to the evil that lurks.

Made from scratch in C++ and developed for the Minimalistic Jam 2, we took the "minimalism" factor seriously,  by creating a full game with only ASCII characters. 

Features:

  • Dialog based trading and combat
  • Full story line to be completed
  • Open world exploration
  • Boss battle
  • And more!

You play as the "@", also referred to as "The Traveler".

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Run into objects to interact (Basically, if you aren't sure what something is, run into it and see what happens.)
  • To save the game, go into the City of Murkwell and press Escape. To load, simply press F1 while in Murkwell.
  • If you click the screen, the game will not function properly, this is an issue with the Windows command prompt. Simply right click the window to fix this.
  • If problems occur on any dialog, simply restart the game.

| = Side Door Right
\ = Side Door Left
_ = Bottom Door
- = Top Door
0 = Portal
@ = Player
a = NPC
æ = Traveling NPC
á = Quest NPC
g = Guard
e = Enemy
* = Item
m = medic

Game requirements:

  • Windows 
  • It's just text. It could run on a literal potato if potatoes could run DOS.
